entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero except minus 4 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 early this evening then light late this evening. Low zero except minus 4 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
